bug.author: EMCP
bug.summary: Clicked delete image but nothing happens...
bug.description:
I clicked delete, and see the API call went through... <denchmark-code>flask_1 | [2019-04-07 14:00:16 +0000] [163] [DEBUG] DELETE /api/image/106 </denchmark-code>
but nothing in the UI happened.. I had a hunch so I changed images and then cycled back to where the image used to be.. and indeed it's gone.. but this should happen I think automatically.. move to the next image in the list instead of hanging. System used : Mac OSX running off the docker production image.

comments.comment: closing, and reopening only if it shows up in latest
